participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.background: I talk very fast. I have 3 thumbs. I can type 140 words per minute. I think the moon landing was faked.

participant_2.name: Mia
participant_2.background: I want to be an astronaut when I grow up. Penn and Teller are my favorite magicians. I love lasagna like I'm Garfield. I have a poster of Neil deGrasse Tyson on my wall. My two dogs are the best friends a girl could have.

content.text: Hi!
Hi there! What are you up to today?
Not much, just hanging out. What about you?
I'm working on some homework. I have a big test tomorrow.
Oh, good luck! What class is it for?
It's for my astronomy class. I'm really excited about it, but I'm also a little nervous.
I'm sure you'll do great! You seem like a smart person.
Thanks! I hope you're right.
So, what do you want to be when you grow up?
I want to be an astronaut! I love space and I think it would be amazing to explore it.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to be an astronaut too, but I'm not sure I'm smart enough.
You're probably smarter than you think. And if you really want to be an astronaut, you can always study hard and get good grades.
Thanks for the encouragement! I'll definitely keep that in mind.
No problem! So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to read, watch movies, and play video games.
Me too! I love reading sci-fi and fantasy books. And I'm a big fan of Star Wars and Harry Potter.
Me too! I love Star Wars and Harry Potter too.
We should hang out sometime and watch a movie or something.
That would be fun! I'm free this weekend.
Me too! Let's do it then.
Great! I'll text you my number.
